attributes.action: Cut fuel Duty for Limo,Mini Cab and Taxi trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of Fuel has risen to a unreasonable proportion where it is virtually impossible to make a living Gordon Brown should cut fuel duty at once
